## Join the movement

- Follow us on social media: [\@openscapes](https://twitter.com/openscapes) on Twitter and [\@openscapes@fosstodon.org](https://fosstodon.org/@openscapes) on Mastodon
- Sign up for our newsletter [mailing list](https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSdgVXRp3V-w94GPWkR31RUfyBl37EphdQSlCOcnyeNlf8OLWw/viewform) (4x/year)
- Join an upcoming [event](events.qmd), including Openscapes initiatives, talks, and seminars
- Talk to your colleagues; consider [Supercharge your research](https://openscapes.github.io/supercharge-research/) for your next journal club or lab meeting
